headline: France: Raids kill 3 suspects, including 2 wanted in Charlie Hebdo attack
content: By Greg Botelho and Ray Sanchez, CNNUpdated 1953 GMT (0353 HKT) January 21, 2015  (CNN)A pair of dramatic raids Friday in France led to the killing of three terrorists -- one suspected in the fatal shooting of a policewoman and four hostages, the other two in the massacre at the offices of Charlie Hebdo magazine -- and to the freeing of more than a dozen people being held hostage.CNN's Jim Sciutto, Ben Brumfield, Atika Shubert, Laura Smith-Spark, Richard Greene, Fred Pleitgen, Christiane Amanpour, Jim Bittermann and Bryony Jones contributed to this report.
